name: deploy-app
description: DEVELOPMENT * Open 2 CLI windows, 1 for your server & 1 for your client 1. *cd group-project* 2. *npm install*  3. *npm start* 4. *cd group-project/client* 5. *npm install* 6. *npm start*

scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd client && npm install --only=dev && npm install && npm run build
